Evansville.Greyhound Bus Terminal (Evansville, Indi: The Greyhound Bus Terminal in downtown Evansville, Indiana, also known as the Greyhound Bus Station, is a Moderne-style building from 1938. It was built at a cost of $150,000. The terminal, at the corner of Third and Sycamore streets, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1979.
